The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
尊敬的家长，
We request you to register early if you are interested in enrolling your child/children in the ‘Saturday English’ programme which will be commencing on August 30th, 2014. These courses are offered at multiple levels and are open to all BSG and Non-BSG students.
如果您有兴趣为您的孩子报读广州英国学校的周六英语课程，请尽早报名，课程将于2014年8月30日开始。 我们提供多种不同程度的课程，校内和校外的学生都可以参加。
This programme is hosted at The British School of Guangzhou on Saturdays, with each exam preparation course running for the duration of a year, at the end of which students sit for an external exam and gain a certificate from the prestigious University of Cambridge.
此课程每周六在广州英国学校举办，各个课程都是为期一年的备考课程，课程结束后学生会参加考试并获得由剑桥大学颁发的证书。
For the next academic year, these are the courses we will be offering:
下个学年我们将提供以下课程：
‘Cambridge English’ courses for Young learners:
少儿剑桥英语课程：
Learning Stars Programme - Suitable for students aged 4-5 years (Reception age)
Starters/Movers/Flyers Programme - Suitable for students from Years 1-6
学习之星学习之星课程 - 适合4-5岁的学生（学前班年龄）
初级/中级/高级 - 适合小学生
‘Cambridge English’ courses for Secondary students:
中学剑桥英语课程：
Level 1 (KET course- A2) - Suitable for Beginners
初级(KET course- A2)-适合初学者
Level 2(PET course - B1) - Suitable for lower intermediate users of English
中级(PET course - B1)-适合中低水平的英语学习者
Level 3 (FCE course- B2) - Suitable for upper intermediate users of English. This course is highly suitable for students preparing for other external examinations such as the IGCSE or ‘A’ level exams.
中高级(FCE course- B2)-适合中高水平的英语学习者。这个课程非常适合其他考试如IGCSE 或A-Level 的备考学生。
Level 4 (CAE course - C1) - Suitable for ‘near native’ speakers or Post FCE students. Over 13,500 universities worldwide accept a ‘pass’ at this level.
高级(CAE course - C1)-适合“接近英语母语”学生者或通过了中高级水平认证的学生。全世界超过13，500的大学都接受这个课程的“合格”水平。
